summary.name: Tobacco Leaf Supply Chain
summary.description:
Unmanufactured tobacco leaf exports from Malawi, Africa, with a focus on the top five countries that receive leaf exports from Malawi. Different segments of the tobacco leaf supply chain are featured in this project. Segments begin in Lilongwe, Malawi, where tobacco arrives from farms in different regions in the country. In Lilongwe, several cigarette leaf manufacturers including US-based Universal Corporation and US-based Alliance One International purchase leaf through pre-arranged contracts with local farmers. A small portion of the tobacco is purchased at open markets in Malawi. Leaf buyers process the tobacco and prepare it for shipping by primarily removing the stems from tobacco leaves. Unmanufactured tobacco is shipped in containers and transported from Lilongwe to the ports in Mozambique and South Africa. After leaving the ports tobacco shipments are transported to Belgium, Germany, Poland, Egypt and the United States. These are the top five countries that receive tobacco exports from Malawi. British American Tobacco, Philp Morris, Japan Tobacco and other global cigarette manufacturers receive the shipments. Next, tobacco is processed into cigarette brands such as Marlboro and Camel and ultimately delivered to distributors, retailers and consumers. Additional research is needed to determine the length of time containers of unmanufactured tobacco is stored before use and to what degree cigarette manufacturers influence global tobacco markets and prices through the manipulation of inventories of unmanufactured tobacco exports from Malawi.

Marty Otañez, "Tobacco Leaf Supply Chain," Manifest: Supply Chain Platform (2024)

overview.name: Limbe Leaf Tobacco Company Ltd
overview.description: This is a leaf buying company and one of the largest exporters of unmanufactured tobacco in Malawi. It's parent company is Universal Corporation, Richmond, Virginia, USA.

location.address: Plot No. 29/126, Alimaunde Industrial Area, Kanengo, Lilongwe, Malawi

overview.name: Alliance One Tobacco (Malawi) Ltd
overview.description: This is a leaf buying company and one of the largest exporters of unmanufactured tobacco in Malawi. It's parent company is Alliance One International/Pyxus, Morrisville, North Carolina, USA.

location.address: Plot No. 29/86, Kanengo Industrial Site, Lilongwe 4, Malawi

overview.name: British American Tobacco Malawi Ltd
overview.description: A global cigarette manufacturer that purchases tobacco leaf from Malawi. It's parent company is British American Tobacco, London, England.

location.address: Along Chipembere highway, opposite Malawi Polytechnic, P.O. Box 428, Blantyre, Malawi

overview.name: JTI (Japan Tobacco International) Malawi
overview.description: A global cigarette manufacturer that purchases tobacco leaf from Malawi. It's parent company is Japan Tobacco, Tokyo, Japan.

overview.name: Port of Beira, Mozambique
overview.description: Port in Mozambique where containers of unmanufactured tobacco from Malawi are exported to other countries.

location.address: Porto da Beira, Largo dos CFM, Beira, Mozambique

overview.name: Port of Durban, South Africa
overview.description: Port, known as Durban Harbor, in South Africa where containers of unmanufactured tobacco from Malawi are exported to other countries.

overview.name: Port of Antwerp, Belgium
overview.description: Port in Belgium where containers of unmanufactured tobacco exports from Malawi are delivered.
